wikitext.*:
'''Elfling''' was a mailing list dedicated to the [[languages]] created by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. It was founded on [[7 September]] [[1998]] by Dorothea Salo, and was maintained by Brook Conner and moderated by [[David Salo]].

As of 12 Septemer 2013 Elfling was dissolved, but transformed into a forum maintained by [[David Salo]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.lotrplaza.com/showthread.php?76295-Elfling-gone-with-the-wind|articlename=Elfling gone with the wind?|dated=|website=Plaza|accessed=6 October 2013}}</ref>
